plugins.title: Data source manager
plugins.description: Manage data sources, including the built-in Main database, external databases, APIs, etc.

plugins.title: Graph collection manager
plugins.description: An ER diagram-like tool. Currently only the Main database is supported.

plugins.title: Data source: Main database
plugins.description: NocoBase main database, supports relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite and so on.

plugins.title: Data source: External MySQL
plugins.description: Use external MySQL databases as data sources.

plugins.title: Data source: External MariaDB
plugins.description: Use external MariaDB databases as data sources.

plugins.title: Data source: External PostgreSQL
plugins.description: Use external PostgreSQL databases as data sources.

plugins.title: Data source: HTTP API
plugins.description: Use HTTP API as data sources.
